SwitchPreference.android:title: Dynamic Precision
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Let TermCalc determine the number of decimal places to display based on your input.

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Maximum Decimal Places
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Note: Some complex operations may take noticeably longer to complete if this value is greater than 10.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Prioritize Coefficients
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Ignore PEMDAS and prioritize evaluating coefficients in front of parentheses.\n(WARNING: Only enable this if you know what you're doing! Enabling this can yield incorrect calculation results)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Live Expression Evaluation
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Calculate and display expression results before pressing the equals button.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use Experimental Input Method
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allows you to go back and edit your input after typing an expression. Note: While this feature is in development, calculations may be inaccurate after doing so. May cause crashes.
